message: Once I get back to my room, I flop down on my bed and stare up at the ceiling.
I'm not in any mood to sleep. The things Granny told me keep racing through my mind.
And what I did to Mizuki...
No matter how I toss and turn, I can't shake the thoughts weighing on me.
Maybe if I'd said the right words back there, I could've saved Mizuki.
Perhaps failure was inevitable. I didn't know what I was doing.
My ignorance put Mizuki in a coma. How is that even possible?
Staring at the ceiling doesn't work, and neither does burying my face in my pillow. I'm just getting more depressed.
It feels like I'm falling into an abyss.
